name: Is it a space odyssey?(fixed)
description:
This game was developed for Beginners Circle Jam #4.

Play online only if you have very powerful PC, otherwise please download game for play.

Controls:

WASD/Space - base movement

C - change the gravity direction for hero

R - resize your hero (Like Ant-man!)

F - open the gate

Left mouse button - grab balls in gravity sphere

Right mouse button - toss balls from gravity sphere

Project management - Leo and Dora
Programming - Veraokulo
3D modeling - Stas and Sergey
Level designing - Ilya

None of use developed a game before. Thanks Angry Smile for helping start to develop games!
